summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Visual Product Matcher application. Backend APIs are fully functional with 100% success rate. Frontend UI works well with proper responsiveness, search functionality, and filters. Minor error handling improvement needed for invalid URLs.

minor_improvements.issue: Invalid URLs cause 500 server error instead of graceful client-side validation
minor_improvements.impact: Users see generic error instead of helpful validation message
minor_improvements.details: When entering 'invalid-url-test', server returns 500 error. Should validate URL format on frontend first.

passed_tests: Search by URL with valid image
Search results display with similarity scores
action_item_for_main_agent: Optional: Add client-side URL validation before API calls to provide better user experience for invalid URLs. Current functionality works but could be more user-friendly.
